sourceDesc.bibl: Chicago Foreign Language Press Survey, 1936-1941, Works Projects Administration, Chicago Public Library Omnibus Project

revisionDesc.change: Initial TEI transcription from PanGeo Partners, Inc.

body.p: p. 6. Under the above title a law firm has been established in the Metropolitan Building.
The members of the firm are Mr. Athanasios A. Pantelis, well known attorney at law, former President the American Legion and now President of the Society of Greek Professional Men.

Mr. John Klein is a distinguished counselor, and very well known among his colleagues for his deep knowledge of law. The third member of this law firm, Mr. George S. Poricos, although being a new practician, nevertheless is the whip of the firm. Saloniki congratulates the distinguished partners of the law firm and wishes them success.
